MODAL.ACCEPT_CONFIRM_TEXT:
If you approve the merchant's return rejection request, the customer's return will be denied. The products are deliver back to the customer. No refund will be made to the customer for products that are rejected.

Do you approve?
MODAL.DESC: Only authorized backoffice people can approve or reject. Return rejection request must be answered within 2 days. Otherwise, the return rejection request is automatically approved. Please check with the merchant and the customer before responding to a return rejection request. If the rejection request is approved, the products deliver back to the customer.
MODAL.REJECT_CONFIRM_TEXT:
If you reject the merchant's return rejection request, the customer's return will be accepted. A deduction is made from the merchant, due to the return.

Do you reject?
MODAL.TITLE: Return Detail
